headline: The Face of Mother
description: A deliberately rough sketch confronting an 'ugly face of motherhood' with candid annotations; part satire, part grief, part truth-telling.

resonantThread: Using abrasive honesty to puncture idealized images and surface complicated feelings around motherhood.
whyItMatters: Interrogates cultural expectations by presenting an intentionally unflattering, emotionally charged depiction that invites discussion about ambivalence and truth.

motifMap.meaning: Rejection of idealized iconography; embracing discomfort
Internal commentary breaking the fourth wall

sourceFragments: Notebook sketch annotated by the author; no external sources.

associatedMedia.description: Photo of hand-drawn notebook sketch labeled 'the ugly face of motherhood' with speech bubbles.
